string.value: Juliet seemed very much in love with Romeo after receiving the letter, which meant one thing. Juliet wants to repay the love with a present of her own. I better go see #bJuliet#k.

Juliet decided the best way to respond to the letter was to cook for him by making a lunchbox. ...A lunchbox by an alchemist from Alcadno... I better help her make one before Juliet poisons Romeo to death with her toxic cooking skills. I better buy the #blunchbox recipe#k from #bHan the Broker#k. \n\n#i4031785##t4031785# #b#c4031785##k/1
I handed Juliet Han the Broker's recipe for lunchbox.

Hello traveler! What do you think Romeo likes more, Stir-Fried Scorpion Tail or Seasoned Bellamoa? Ahh, it might be a little far from here, but how about a Poison Popper Stew? What do you think?\r\n#b#L0# I almost threw up. Please tell me you're not thinking about serving that to your boyfriend!#l

Why, yes! I just received a letter from Romeo. I can't just sit here and do nothing, so I decided to make a delicious, special dish for the love of my life. Don't you think he'll love it if I make an exotic lunch for him? \r\n#b#L0#...If he lives after eating it...#l

I've never cooked before, can you tell? But I've also made some clothes, this can't be that much different. I just don't know what kind of food he'll like, though... what do you think?\r\n#b#L0# How about a plain dish? Something that won't make him break up with you?#l
A plain dish? Well... maybe a plain dish that's delicious can be more special than anything else! Well, in that case, can you please help me? I want to make this lunch special!

Hello traveler! What do you think Romeo likes more, #rStir-Fried Scorpion Tail#k or #rSeasoned Bellamoa#k? Ahh, it might be a little far from here, but how about a Poison Popper Stew? What do you think?\r\n#b#L0# What... what are you talking about?#l

I just received a letter like that from Romeo. I can't just sit here and do nothing, so I decided to make a delicious, special dish for Romeo. Don't you think he'll love it if I make a lunch box for him? \r\n#b#L0#...(Hopefully he'll be alive after eating them!)#l

I've never cooked before, but since I also successfully made some clothes, I don't think this will be much different. I just don't know what kind of food he'll like, though... what do you think?\r\n#b#L0# How about a plain dish?#l
A plain dish? Well... maybe a plain dish that's delicious can be more special than anything else... well.. In that case, can you please help me get a recipe for a delicious lunch?

There's only one place in Magatia that you can get a recipe for delicious food, through #bHan the Broker#k. He also has items that have nothing to do with alchemy, so please get a #blunchbox recipe#k from him.
Hmm... you must be really busy right now. Maybe I should try #rDark Wyvern Wing Stew#k...
Ah, you purchased a recipe from Han the Broker. Thank you so much! I'll have to start making the lunchbox out of this right this minute... with all my heart for Romeo.
I don't think you have gotten the #blunchbox recipe#k yet. The only person in Magatia that sells the recipes is #bHan the Broker#k, so please ask him.
